Package src.main.dao

Class LogDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
src.main.dao.AbstractDAO<Bill>
src.main.dao.LogDAO<T>
public class LogDAO<T> extends AbstractDAO<Bill>
This class contains the basic operations specific to a log (findByClientID, findByProductID, updateByID, insert). In addition to these methods, it also includes methods that create SELECT, INSERT, and UPDATE queries.
